snippet: “I’ll beat her rear end on that stage and you know what? After I do, she’ll be relieved because she’ll just be worried I was going to serve her with a subpoena.” – Gov. Chris Christie, discussing Hillary Clinton at a campaign event in Lebanon, N.H.
abstract: “I’ll beat her rear end on that stage and you know what? After I do, she’ll be relieved because she’ll just be worried I was going to serve her with a subpoena.” – Gov. Chris Christie, discussing Hillary Clinton at a campaign event in Lebanon, N.H.

headline.main: Verbatim: Chris Christie Foresees an Easy Time With Hillary Clinton
